article_title: A Real Wolf of Wall Street Selling New York Apartment for $44 Million
article_text: Executive Editor Yuval Rosenberg oversees coverage of business, the economy, technology and Wall Street. A former web editor at WNYC, Fortune and Newsweek, he also writes on a wide range of subjects.

og.description: The real life inspiration for a character in The Wolf of Wall Street has listed his two-story Manhattan townhouse for $43.5 million.
og.title: A Real Wolf of Wall Street Selling New York Apartment for $44 Million

Executive Editor Yuval Rosenberg oversees coverage of business, the economy, technology and Wall Street.
A former web editor at WNYC, Fortune and Newsweek, he also writes on a wide range of subjects.
